Text.Page:
Killian and the Atel Akaad aren't taking the hint. Be a good and send them a message they can understand.

Take out the {@LinkCreature:57#1#sikandari stalwarts}, {@LinkCreature:57#5#geilrik hellhounds}, {@LinkCreature:57#13#Lokian bloodchargers}, {@LinkCreature:57#16#bloodmaguses}, {@LinkCreature:57#26#bloodspillers}, {@LinkCreature:57#21#bloodshapers}, and {@LinkCreature:57#23#eldritch vanquishers}.

Report to Vevina at Crimson Hammer Camp when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
